name: Borrowed Time (itch) (Malicious Intent)
description: This game was made for the Pygame Summer Game Jam 2021. It is my first game jam and the first game I have released publicly as a solo developer. It has been so much fun to make and I've learned so much from it. Hopefully I can take these lessons back to my long term projects and apply them there. And a big thanks to Shadow Programmer for hosting the jam, and all the people who participated!
